medium: Cotton; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, appliqué, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Two panel, four selvedge huipil; machine embroidery on appliquéd neckline; white ground; complex, dense multi-colored patterning consisting of bird, animal and human-like figures on the bottom row which seem to grow increasingly abstracted as the pattern rises toward the shoulders.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
